summary: Feature request to call the Core worker.validate method on worker start/run, added in sdk-core PR #750, and propagate any validation errors to the user.
userImpact: Users need validation errors from the Core worker to be surfaced during worker startup to catch configuration issues early.
proposedFix: Call worker.validate() on worker start/run and propagate any errors to the user
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to call Core worker.validate method and handle validation errors
keyQuote: validate added in sdk-core PR #750, make sure to call it on worker start/run and if it errors, error to the user
